extName.message: oneClipper - v3 web clipper for oneNote

extDescription.message: Clip article,selected text, images to oneNote. Take screenshot & save to oneNote. Faster & more user-friendly than official oneNote

ctrl_c_tooltip.message: turn on/off ctrl+c listener on webpage

highlight_permission.message: Permission required to show highlighted text when you re-visit webpages

give_access_to_oneclipper.message: Give access to oneClipper to insert clipped contents into oneNote
give_access_to_oneclipper.description: Give access to oneClipper to insert clipped contents into oneNote

summarize_following_content_in_bullet_po.message: Summarize following content in bullet points

show_highlight_of_following_content_in_b.message: Show highlight of following content in bullet points
show_highlight_of_following_content_in_b.description: Show highlight of following content in bullet points

oAuth_token_expires_in_1hour.message: oAuth token expires in 1hour. Need permission to refresh token automatically
oAuth_token_expires_in_1hour.description: oAuth token expires in 1hour. Need permission to refresh token automatically

we_dont_read_any_files.message: We don't read any files inside onenote.
